org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util
Class FSVisitor

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.FSVisitor

@InterfaceAudience.Private
public final class FSVisitor
extends Object

Utility methods for interacting with the hbase.root file system.
